name: Asteroids (itch) (ArtCBao)
description:
Endless runner game - Use the Up/Down Arrow keys to dodge the Asteroids

This is my very first game that I've ever created. Please throw some comments (both good and bad). I would love to create more games in the future but I'll need your feedback to know what to improve on. 

Big Shout out to BlackThornProd and his channel for inspiring me to start developing games. CHECK OUT HIS YOUTUBE CHANNEL OR HIS ITCH CHANNEL!!!
